snippet: All-Clad, known for pots and pans, has made some useful cutting tools.
abstract: All-Clad, the company that made its name in pots and pans, is offering high-carbon stainless steel blade knives in sleek, beautifully finished rosewood handles smoothly wrapped with steel at the end.
lead_paragraph: All-Clad, known for pots and pans, has made some useful cutting tools.

headline.seo: All-Clad Is the Latest to Make Kitchen Knives
headline.main: Kitchen Knives by a Household Name
headline.print_headline: Kitchen Knives By a Household Name
